content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Setup at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at position(8.5, 13.5)
- Iron gear input system:
  - Wooden chest at position(8.5, 10.5)
  - Burner inserter at position(8.5, 11.5)
- Copper input system:
  - Burner inserter at position(6.5, 13.5)
- Output system:
  - Burner inserter at position(10.5, 13.5)
  - Wooden chest at position(11.5, 13.5)

### Iron Production System at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at position(-22.5, -58.5) with burner inserter at position(-23.5, -58.5)

### Additional Iron Production System at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at position(-12.5, -50.5) with burner inserter at position(-13.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position(41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at position(41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
Connected by pipe groups (fluid systems 4881, 4882, 4883, 4884, 4886)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities near existing structures
- Check for existing entities (transport belts, electric poles, inserters) before placing new entities
- Increase spacing parameter when placing entities if the default spacing results in collision
- Consider alternative directions when the desired placement position is blocked

### Errors related to missing resources
- Ensure required items (copper plates, iron gear wheels) are in inventory before attempting to insert into chests
- Craft required components before setting up production chains

### Power and fuel related issues
- Ensure burner entities have fuel (coal) loaded
- Connect power generating structures properly to maintain electricity supply
- Make sure boilers have both fuel and water supply

### Production line setup
- Verify all components of production chains are properly connected and aligned
- Ensure input/output positions of inserters match with the intended source/target entities
- Consider the entire production flow when placing new structures to avoid blocking existing paths
